Projects Papers About

OpenQuadruped

What is this?

I designed & developed a 3D-printed quadrupedal robot dog from scratch. Features custom 12DOF Inverse Kinematics model + Intuitive Gait Planner.

More information:

I am currently still writing this project page. However, you can find more technical information about this project on my github repo. I also wrote this whitepaper on my custom 12DOF Inverse Kinematic Model that accounts for the various joint offsets in my design.

I also gave a relatively in-depth presentation about the dog and its progress to my co-workers at Formlabs, which I uploaded to youtube here:
